author: sussman
msg: Code cleanups to the export editor (issue #1230), enable it for good now.
Go ahead and throw this change into the 0.22 release branch.
* export.c:  remove the dir_baton completely, it only held an
(struct file_baton):  remove pointer to parent dir baton, point to
(open_root): return the edit_baton as the new root baton.
(add_directory): return the edit_baton as the new dir baton.
(add_file):  assume the incoming dir baton is the edit baton.
(close_file):  initialize final keyword struct to NULL.  And use
(svn_client_export):  enable the new export editor permanently.

author: mprice
msg: * CHANGES: fix minor typo in previous commit
